name: Hiza no Ue no Partner: Kitty on your lap
overview: Hiza no ue no Partner - Kitty on Your Lap is a simulation game in which the player controls a first year college student that find 3 little cats in a box and he choose one of them to live with him. The next morning when he wakes up he discover that the cat had transformed into a little cat girl. The little cat girl will be with him during a whole year, she will also encounter the other 2 cat girls that are on charge of other 2 students. The game features different events and the player can choose what he wants his character to do in every week and the different answer that his character will answer to what the other characters asked him during the adventure. Sometimes in the weeks there are a status screen in which the player can choose what he wants to do with the little cat: GOing shopping, listen to here, watch the tv, etc. Depending of those actions the cat stats will be different. The cats name are Mimi, Yuki & Lena but the player can change their names if he wants to. The game fatures 4 different narrators voices that can be choose at the main menu.
